title: Anonymous function declarations should be hoisted
body:
https://rollupjs.org/repl?version=0.52.1&

That code throws `f` is not defined, because the function exported by `f.js` is not hoisted. If I give a name to that function or I remove `import f from "f.js"` from `main.js`, everything works.

I'm not 100% sure that this is a bug, since `@std/esm` works exactly like rollup. On the other hand, with `node --experimental-modules` it logs `"fn"`.
